body:
Docker image:
https://pantheon.corp.google.com/gcr/images/grpc-testing/GLOBAL/grpc_interop_python@sha256:cdc3aea8e297f85eb593f7ccee3959dbab0c481a14175d4f14ad91194719c50f/details/info?project=grpc-testing

Docker command to run the image:
docker run -i --rm=true -e PYTHONPATH=/var/local/git/grpc/src/python/gens -e LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/var/local/git/grpc/libs/opt -w /var/local/git/grpc --net=host --name interop_client_python_95c06f76-cc4a-4b80-9fa5-e2f03dc27722 $docker_image bash -l -c "py27/bin/python src/python/grpcio_tests/setup.py run_interop --client --args="--server_host=grpc-test.sandbox.googleapis.com --server_host_override=grpc-test.sandbox.googleapis.com --server_port=443 --use_tls=true --test_case=large_unary""
